summary: Famous lover Casanova now long past his prime, meets Count Dracula during a journey to Transylvania.
cast: Vicenç Altaió|Lluís Serrat|Eliseu Huertas|Noelia Rodenas|Clara Visa|Montse Triola|Mike Landscape|Lluís Carbó|Clàudia Robert|Xavier Pau|Floarga Dootz|Rosa Tharrats|Sebastián Vogler
title: Historia de mi muerte
